amendatorysection.para: Sections 44-3901 to 44-3908 shall not apply to the following persons:
(1) Licensees for whom an examination is not required under the laws of this state;
(2) Licensees who sell or consult only in the areas of credit life insurance and credit accident and health insurance; and
(3) Licensees holding such limited or restricted licenses as the director may exempt.
